narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This facility meets the requirements for obtaining a class "C" exhibitors license. The license fee should be sent to
the Regional Office at the address below. 
No Regulated activity may be conducted until a valid USDA license is obtained.
Exit interview conducted with the owner.
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
920 Main Campus Drive, Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27606
